This has all the outputs that are related to the Output Quality Metric

learnerSubmissionSteps.intro:
Learner Submissions Page

This page has details of a single learner submission.

Learner Submissions Table

This is the Learner submissions container. It contains all the output submissions of the learner.

Phases Bar

This is the phases bar and it shows all the outputs for all the weeks the learner submitted them.
On clicking this back button, you will be redirected back to all the submissions for all your learners
This has all the outputs that are related to the Values Alignment Metric
This has all the outputs that are related to the Output Quality Metric
This has all the outputs that are related to the Feedback Metric

Look Out! This is a hint

Look out for them. Click on them to get more information about certain parts of the page

valueOutputSteps.intro:
Learner Outputs Table

This is the output table. It displays the submission's expected Learning outcome, Description, Outputs, Due Date, Action and the LFA Feedback.

Leaning Outcomes Column

This column displays all the expected learning outcomes

Description Column

This column holds the description of an expected learning outcome.

Outputs Column

This column holds the task description of an expected learning outcome.

Due Date Column

This column displays the due date of an expected learning outcome.

Action Column

This column displays the action that you are supposed to take on the given learning outcome

LFA Column

This column displays the buttons that pops up the view feedback modal of a given learning outcome

Show More Link

On clicking this link, you will be able to see more description of an expected learning outcome
Upon clicking this button, a feedback/submission modal will pop up.

feedbackModalSteps.intro:
View Feedback Modal

This is the View Feedback Modal.

Details Bar

This bar has the submission's phase details and the learning outcome being assessed

Submissions and Feedback Bar

When this bar is active, you can be able to view a learner's submission and give feedback

Reflection Bar

When this bar is active, you can be able to view a learner's reflection

LFA Feedback

This is where the LFA gives their impression and feedback concerning the given learner output

Cancel Button

This button cancels the feedback submission

Submit Feedback Button

This button initiates feedback submission

submissionModalSteps.intro:
Submissions Modal

This is the Submission Modal.

Details Bar

This bar has the submission's phase details and the learning outcome being assessed

Submissions and Feedback Bar

When this bar is active, you can be able to view a learner's submission and give feedback

Reflection Bar

When this bar is active, you can be able to view a learner's reflection

Feedback Form

This is where the LFA gives their impression and feedback concerning the given learner's output

Cancel Button

This button cancels the feedback submission

Submit Feedback Button

This button initiates feedback submission

outputQualitySteps.intro:
Learner Submission Table

This row holds the columns of details of a learners output depending on a given learning outcome

Show More Link

On clicking this link, you will be able to see more description of an expected learning outcome
Upon clicking this button, a feedback/submission modal will pop up.
